Writer: Robert C. O'Brien (novel), Don Bluth (story adaptation), John Pomeroy (story adaptation), Gary Goldman (story adaptation), Will Finn (story adaptation)
Title: The Secret of NIMH
Actors: Derek Jacobi, Elizabeth Hartman, Arthur Malet, Dom DeLuise
Plot: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.
